医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
儿童肥胖：前 2000 天如何成为终身健康的关键研究人员发现，早期生活因素，尤其是出生后 2000 天内的因素，在影响未来肥胖风险方面发挥着关键作用。通过综合干预措施解决这些因素可以应对全球儿童肥胖危机。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Childhood-obesity-How-the-first-2000-days-hold-the-key-to-lifelong-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Childhood-obesity-How-the-first-2000-days-hold-the-key-to-lifelong-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e20354a-72d5-4c69-98d4-81a29bb6c7a6 Thu, 26 Sep 2024 01:35:00 -0400 Childhood obesity: How the first 2,000 days hold the key to lifelong health
微藻能否成为结束全球饥饿和拯救地球的秘密武器？研究人员强调了商业养殖的微藻通过提供必需营养素和减少环境影响来应对全球营养不良的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Could-microalgae-be-the-secret-weapon-to-ending-global-hunger-and- saving-the-planet.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Could-microalgae-be-the-secret-weapon-to-ending-global-hunger-and- saving-the-planet.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc3aa565-41c3-48eb-b456-12fd4ef79abb Thu, 26 Sep 2024 01:02:00 -0400 Could microalgae be the secret weapon to ending global hunger and saving the planet?
热图揭示了阿片类药物依赖的各州情况今天，FAIR Health 发布了阿片类药物追踪器，这是一种免费的交互式工具，用于跟踪各州的阿片类药物滥用和依赖性。同时发布的简介提供了阿片类药物追踪器的用户指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Heat-map-reveals-state-by-state-landscape-of-opioid-dependence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Heat-map-reveals-state-by-state-landscape-of-opioid-dependence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61a3c480-6d87-4069-ae1b-3aa8754264f8 Thu, 26 Sep 2024 00:39:00 -0400 Heat map reveals state-by-state landscape of opioid dependence
无创成像揭示饮食对心血管健康的影响食用高脂肪膳食后血液营养和脂质水平的动态是当前和未来心血管健康的重要指标。传统上，测量这些循环物质涉及侵入性抽血，这对于定期健康跟踪来说是不可行的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Nonpressive-imaging-reveals-impact-of-diet-on-cardioangio-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Nonpressive-imaging-reveals-impact-of-diet-on-cardioangio-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5788f02c-ef2b-401f-bff2-9e2df44c517f Thu, 26 Sep 2024 00:35:44 -0400 Noninvasive imaging reveals impact of diet on cardiovascular health
COVID-19 会导致与脑损伤标志物相关的持久认知障碍研究人员发现，COVID-19 患者在住院一年后出现了广泛的认知缺陷，这与脑损伤标志物升高和脑容量减少有关。随着时间的推移，认知恢复趋于稳定，这表明影响是持久的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/COVID-19-causes- permanent-cognitive-impairment-tied-to-brain-injury-markers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/COVID-19-causes- permanent-cognitive-impairment-tied-to-brain-injury-markers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a64e5b6c-39ef-4cbf-82da-03e3380fa3d9 Thu, 26 Sep 2024 00:29:00 -0400 COVID-19 causes lasting cognitive impairment tied to brain injury markers
靶向治疗可改善妊娠结局在经历过反复流产的女性中，大约 20% 的人针对母亲自身身体的特定抗体检测呈阳性。神户大学领导的一个研究小组现在发现了一种治疗方法，可以大大增加这些女性足月分娩且没有并发症的机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Targeted-therapy-improves-pregnancy-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Targeted-therapy-improves-pregnancy-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6aca3bb-be43-4dd1-b413-62d073be8a9e Thu, 26 Sep 2024 00:27:50 -0400 Targeted therapy improves pregnancy outcomes
条形码技术揭示癌症转移的秘密转移性癌症的诊断可能是毁灭性的。癌症正在扩散。它可能会传播到体内的多个器官。这可能意味着更多的痛苦，并最终导致死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Barcoding-technology-reveals-secrets-of-cancer-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Barcoding-technology-reveals-secrets-of-cancer-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e2469f0-99dc-44f1-8aec-37498ffba68d Thu, 26 Sep 2024 00:20:49 -0400 Barcoding technology reveals secrets of cancer metastasis
多组学分析揭示钌基抗癌剂的作用机制该研究由谭才平教授、毛宗万教授（中山大学化学学院生物无机与合成化学教育部重点实验室）和李正秋教授（中山大学药学院）领导。暨南大学肿瘤分子生物学教育部重点实验室）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Multi-omics-analysis-reveals-mechanism-of-action-for-ruthenium-based-anti-cancer-agent.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Multi-omics-analysis-reveals-mechanism-of-action-for-ruthenium-based-anti-cancer-agent.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c39e21e3-d58b-4d2f-9ee1-0af70ab89449 Thu, 26 Sep 2024 00:14:28 -0400 Multi-omics analysis reveals mechanism of action for ruthenium-based anti-cancer agent
了解 SARS-CoV-2 的病毒感染策略Acta Pharmaceutica Sinica B 发表的这篇新文章讨论了 SARS-CoV-2 ORF10 劫持泛素化机制如何揭示潜在的独特药物靶向位点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Understanding-SARS-CoV-2s-viral-strategies-for-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Understanding-SARS-CoV-2s-viral-strategies-for-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf9f21eb-ef2a-46e3-8c7d-da0ae0c03f73 Thu, 26 Sep 2024 00:10:41 -0400 Understanding SARS-CoV-2's viral strategies for infection
英国医生转向人工智能聊天机器人进行诊断和记录，但他们是否会将患者隐私置于危险之中？最近的一项调查发现，20% 的英国全科医生在临床实践中使用人工智能聊天机器人，帮助记录、诊断和患者管理。然而，人们仍然对错误、偏见和隐私风险感到担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/UK-doctors-turn-to-AI-chatbots-for-diagnoses-and-documentation-but-are-they-putting-病人-隐私-at-风险.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/UK-doctors-turn-to-AI-chatbots-for-diagnoses-and-documentation-but-are-they-putting-病人-隐私-at- risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1834cfa-14b5-40c7-8b6c-84579359d2f5 Thu, 26 Sep 2024 00:05:00 -0400 UK doctors turn to AI chatbots for diagnoses and documentation, but are they putting patient privacy at risk?
